title: Enhancing Road Damage Detection Through Transfer Learning and HCI-Centric Design
description: Developed an automated road damage detection system using transfer learning on a locally annotated dataset, tailored for Bangladeshi conditions.  Integrated global Road Damage Dataset (RDD) standards and user feedback to improve detection accuracy and relevance. Incorporated Human-Computer Interaction (HCI) principles, ensuring user trust, transparency, and practical deployment potential.

title: Skin Lesion Classification Using Deep Convolutional Neural Network
description: Utilizing a base paper, which used ResNet50, DenseNet201, and Inception V3 with additional layers to classify 7 types of skin lesions with accuracy 86.91%. We achieved a 89.44% accuracy by using InceptionResNetV2.
